title: 寻找按钮
author: lmc1998913
txt_content:
Find The Button Plus Released: HEREThe main goal of the game is simple you go through many test chambers until you reach the end.


How you do this is you press the button that is hidden through the level.


After it is found you are sent to the next chamber


You repeat this with many different styles and types of levels until you reach the end where you can create your own map for Find The Button Plus.
这是用有道翻译的：
游戏的主要目标是简单的你经历许多测试室直到你到达终点。
你怎么做是你按的按钮,隐藏通过水平。
后发现你发送到下一个房间
你重复这个与许多不同的风格和类型的水平直到你到达终点,你可以创建自己的地图,找到按钮加上。
